item.description:
This is a potluck meetup.

Please bring:
-a raw dish to share (other members will probably ask what ingredients you've used, i.e. does it include gluten or honey....)
-your own silverware, plates and cups. (limited washing facilities.)


The 37a wharf street location is located between Street & Co and my clothing shop (brook there). It's a private ground floor room with chairs and a big table. It is easy to find and the address is well-marked. call me if you get lost - 415-5605.

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: late september Raw Food meetup
